document_data.name: ''Potion of Evil Protection''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of evil protection''''' were magic [[potion]]s that granted the imbiber protection from creatures of evil and those who venerated the forces of darkness.
document_data.Powers: The potions bestowed its protective effects when imbibed, increasing defenses against [[outsider]] creatures from [[Lower planes|planes of evil]] and from mortals who followed [[evil]] creeds and faiths.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1312}}, ''potions of evil protection'', encased in rustic clay [[vial]]s could be found in the town of [[Targos]] in [[Icewind Dale]], in the hands of magically-inclined citizens of [[Ten Towns]] and [[Reghedmen]] [[shaman]]s and traders.
